description:
Social Media Marketing Jumpstart.

Are you struggling to get your social media activities off the ground? Or...wondering why in the world do you need social media marketing? You're not alone!

If you’re new to online marketing, it’s hard to see the immediate advantage of having social media followers.

According to KISSMetrics, most marketers know that social networks such as Facebook, Twitter and LinkedIn are crucial to engaging their audience and building their brand – but as it turns out, only a third of them have a long term plan of action to reap the benefits of their promotions.

Startups and small businesses most of the times don't even know the use of Twitter or Linkedin, simply because they don't know what it is and how it works. DOES THIS SOUND FAMILIAR TO YOU? If yes, you are at the right place!

Remember! Today, social media planning and marketing is no longer a question—it’s an absolute necessity.

The entire process is an ONGOING, EVOLVING conversation, and businesses need to be part of it to continue reaching their audiences.

Social media will help grow your business, engage with prospects, increase communication, improve customer service. And...with this course you will learn how.

You’ll learn the core elements your social strategy needs to be successful and sustainable.

And, here is what you'll learn in depth:

  1. Customer Engagement with Facebook
  2. Forecasting a Social Media Plan
  3. Lead Generation with LinkedIn
  4. Right Way to Tweet your Brand
  5. Get Most of Facebook Ads

The course is easy to chew, as its structured in 8 video lessons. Each will take around 5-10 minutes. The entire video lessons clock in around 1 hour. So, why not to learn new skills in a lunch hour?

Join us today at the Social Media Marketing Jumpstart course, and take your business to the next level!
title: Increase Engagement with Social Media
